info.name: gmail-b2b-nightshade
info.description: Nightshade color theme for the gmail-b2b userstyle.
info.additionalInfo:
Okay, I'm experimenting a bit with combining multiple userstyles, so nothing much to download here yet, but keep an eye out on this page.

Okay, I haven't much time to update this style, but since I see people have installed it, a small note: You are supposed to install the gmail-b2b style first, then also install this style for the full experience...
